Agility.name: Catfall
Agility.description: When this fighter falls or jumps down, they are not Pinned and do not take any damage from falling.

Agility.name: Dodge
Agility.description: If this fighter is hit by a ranged attack, they can make an Initiative check. If the check is passed, the hit is ignored.

Agility.name: Spring Up
Agility.description: If this fighter is Pinned, they can make an Initiative check. If the check is passed, they can stand up for free.

Agility.name: Sprint
Agility.description: When this fighter makes a Double Move, they can triple their Movement instead of doubling it.

Agility.name: Acrobat
Agility.description: This fighter can move through enemy models as if they were not there.

Agility.name: Clamber
Agility.description: This fighter can climb any distance vertically without making an Initiative check.

Brawn.name: Bulging Biceps
Brawn.description: This fighter can use Unwieldy weapons without the Unwieldy penalty.

Brawn.name: Iron Jaw
Brawn.description: If this fighter is hit by an attack with the Melee trait, they can make a Toughness check. If the check is passed, the hit is ignored.

Brawn.name: Headbutt
Brawn.description: If this fighter makes a successful hit in close combat, they can make an additional attack with the Headbutt trait.

Brawn.name: Nerves of Steel
Brawn.description: When this fighter is hit by a ranged attack, they can make a Cool check. If the check is passed, they are not Pinned.

Brawn.name: Unstoppable
Brawn.description: When this fighter makes a Recovery test, they can roll two dice and choose the result.

Brawn.name: Juggernaut
Brawn.description: This fighter can make a free Move action when they are activated, even if they are Pinned.

Combat.name: Berserker
Combat.description: This fighter can make an additional attack when they charge.

Combat.name: Combat Master
Combat.description: This fighter does not suffer penalties for being outnumbered in close combat.

Combat.name: Counter-Charge
Combat.description: If an enemy fighter charges this fighter, they can make a free Charge action against that enemy.

Combat.name: Feint
Combat.description: When this fighter makes an attack in close combat, they can re-roll one of their attack dice.

Combat.name: Rain of Blows
Combat.description: This fighter can make an additional attack when they make a Fight action.

Combat.name: Parry
Combat.description: When this fighter is attacked in close combat, they can force the attacker to re-roll one successful hit.

Cunning.name: Ambush
Cunning.description: This fighter can set up an Ambush. When an enemy fighter moves within 6", this fighter can make a free Shoot action.

Cunning.name: Escape Artist
Cunning.description: This fighter can make a free Move action when they are activated, even if they are Engaged.

Cunning.name: Infiltrate
Cunning.description: This fighter can be set up anywhere on the battlefield, more than 9" away from any enemy fighters.

Cunning.name: Overwatch
Cunning.description: This fighter can make a free Shoot action when an enemy fighter moves within their line of sight.

Cunning.name: Sneak Attack
Cunning.description: This fighter can make a free Charge action when they are activated, even if they are not within range of an enemy fighter.

Cunning.name: Trap Specialist
Cunning.description: This fighter can set up a trap. When an enemy fighter moves within 6", the trap is triggered and the enemy fighter is Pinned.

Ferocity.name: Bull Charge
Ferocity.description: When this fighter makes a Charge action, they can add D3" to their Movement.

Ferocity.name: Fearsome
Ferocity.description: Enemy fighters must pass a Cool check to make a Charge action against this fighter.

Ferocity.name: Killer Instinct
Ferocity.description: This fighter can re-roll failed wound rolls in close combat.

Ferocity.name: True Grit
Ferocity.description: When this fighter makes a Recovery test, they can roll two dice and choose the result.

Ferocity.name: Unstoppable
Ferocity.description: When this fighter makes a Recovery test, they can roll two dice and choose the result.

Ferocity.name: Nerves of Steel
Ferocity.description: When this fighter is hit by a ranged attack, they can make a Cool check. If the check is passed, they are not Pinned.

Leadership.name: Commanding Presence
Leadership.description: Friendly fighters within 6" of this fighter can use this fighter’s Leadership characteristic instead of their own.

Leadership.name: Inspiring Presence
Leadership.description: Friendly fighters within 6" of this fighter can re-roll failed Cool checks.

Leadership.name: Iron Will
Leadership.description: This fighter can re-roll failed Leadership checks.

Leadership.name: Mentor
Leadership.description: When this fighter is activated, they can choose a friendly fighter within 6". That fighter gains an additional XP.

Leadership.name: Overseer
Leadership.description: This fighter can make a free Group Activation action when they are activated.

Leadership.name: Tactician
Leadership.description: This fighter can make a free Tactics action when they are activated.

Shooting.name: Fast Shot
Shooting.description: This fighter can make an additional Shoot action when they are activated.

Shooting.name: Gunfighter
Shooting.description: This fighter can make a Shoot action with a Pistol weapon, even if they are Engaged.

Shooting.name: Hip Shooting
Shooting.description: This fighter can make a Shoot action after making a Move action.

Shooting.name: Marksman
Shooting.description: This fighter can re-roll failed hit rolls when making a Shoot action.

Shooting.name: Precision Shot
Shooting.description: This fighter can ignore the target’s cover when making a Shoot action.

Shooting.name: Trick Shot
Shooting.description: This fighter can make a Shoot action with a -1 penalty to hit, but the attack gains the Rending trait.

Savant.name: Ballistics Expert
Savant.description: This fighter can re-roll failed Ammo checks.

Savant.name: Fixer
Savant.description: This fighter can make a free Trade action when they are activated.

Savant.name: Inventor
Savant.description: When this fighter is activated, they can make an Intelligence check. If the check is passed, they invent a new piece of equipment.

Savant.name: Munitioneer
Savant.description: Friendly fighters within 6" of this fighter can re-roll failed Ammo checks.

Savant.name: Savvy Trader
Savant.description: This fighter can make a free Trade action when they are activated.

Savant.name: Weaponsmith
Savant.description: This fighter can make a free Repair action when they are activated.
